text: My preferred place to study is at my school
ipa: maɪ prɪˈfɜːd pleɪs tuː ˈstʌdi ɪz æt maɪ skuːl

text: The school’s learning environment encourages me to focus on learning
ipa: ðə skuːlz ˈlɜːnɪŋ ɪnˈvaɪərənmənt ɪnˈkʌrɪʤɪz miː tuː ˈfəʊkəs ɒn ˈlɜːnɪŋ

text: Usually, students spend most of their time on campus
ipa: ˈjuːʒʊəli, ˈstjuːdənts spɛnd məʊst ɒv ðeə taɪm ɒn ˈkæmpəs

text: In my case, I can ask classmates to study with me after a class
ipa: ɪn maɪ keɪs, aɪ kæn ɑːsk ˈklɑːsmeɪts tuː ˈstʌdi wɪð miː ˈɑːftər ə klɑːs

text: The teachers are available to help me if I have questions
ipa: ðə ˈtiːʧəz ɑːr əˈveɪləbl tuː hɛlp miː ɪf aɪ hæv ˈkwɛsʧənz
